links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
mathematica: With[{nn=30}, Take[CoefficientList[Series[ArcTan[Sinh[x]Cos[x]],{x,0,nn}], x] Range[0,nn-1]!, {2,-1,2}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 16 2012 *)
